FindingName: Mailbox auditing for all users is Disabled
Description: By turning on mailbox auditing, Microsoft 365 back office teams can track logons to a mailbox as well as what actions are taken while the user is logged on.
Remediation: Refer to referenced and the CIS_Microsoft_365_Foundations_Benchmark_v1.4.0.pdf Paragraph 5.2 for the PowerShell instructions.

References.Text: Paragraph: 5.2 - Ensure mailbox auditing for all users is Enabled (Automated)
